thread.title: Here's Emma Watson Singing in Disney's New 'Beauty and the Beast' Trailer
thread.title_full: Here's Emma Watson Singing in Disney's New 'Beauty and the Beast' Trailer

title: Here's Emma Watson Singing in Disney's New 'Beauty and the Beast' Trailer
text:
Here's Emma Watson Singing in Disney's New 'Beauty and the Beast' Trailer 
Disney saved the best new teaser for last. Twitter By Alyssa Bailey Jan 8, 2017 In the last two weeks, we've seen several new teasers for Beauty and the Beast —but none with a musical accompaniment courtesy of Emma Watson. Disney's newest look at the March film features new footage of Emma as Belle and the first preview of her singing "Belle". And, well, #impressed On March 17, experience an adventure in the great wide somewhere. #BeOurGuest pic.twitter.com/NUAUtpMfsH 
— Beauty and the Beast (@beourguest) January 9, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
